text: Yumnam Gopi Singh (born 1 February 1999) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for East Bengal. ==Career== Born in Manipur, to a Hindu Meitei family. Singh began his career with local side NEROCA in the I-League. He made his professional debut for the club on 1 December 2017 against Minerva Punjab. He started and played 50 minutes as NEROCA lost 2–1. On 25 May 2018, Singh signed with ATK of the Indian Super League. Mid-way through the season, Singh was replaced in the senior squad by Ashish Pradhan. Singh then appeared for ATK Reserves as captain in their opening I-League 2nd Division match against Mohammedan. He then scored his first goal of the season for ATK Reserves on 23 January 2019 against Jamshedpur Reserves.
